siteMetadata.siteHeadline: Polaroid Gatsby Theme by Arpit Sheth
siteMetadata.siteDescription: Polaroid is a photography-focused Gatsby theme for building portfolio websites. It supports an MDX blog with tags/categories, syntax-highlighted code blocks, Theme UI for dark mode, and Typescript. Designed & developed by Arpit Sheth.
siteMetadata.author: @shetharp
